channel.title: Im searching someone to keep my server up
channel.description:
Hey everyone.
[b]I have worked on my rsps server about half week. I have everything done in server and client. Portforward account done, and server has been in serverstatus. Its called Pkz-Scape. Nice shops at home and it has shops in modzone,donatorzone and staffzone. Couple nice things in zones. Example: In Modzone you can buy gilded stuff etc. It has 474 weapon stance and specs 100% working. It has special things, like godwars bosses spot with escape portal and talk to gnome at home to get to "Crazy b*tch" npc and click santa for joke ^^ Pretty nice stuff in server. Good donator-shop too. Forums are ready. I have pictures uploaded to imageshack so u dont need to do screenshot thing.[/b]
But here's the problem :/ -I cant keep it up 24/7, because my parents are shutting the router down for a night and they didnt listen me when i told I'm losing real money.
[b]If someone kind guy/girl can keep it up, he will get all cash from donations and u will be co-owner :p. Will some1 help me?[/b]
Thanks for reading this :) PM me

item.title: Im searching someone to keep my server up
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

L… Not aloud to ask for hosters on this website

Read full topic
item.source: Im searching someone to keep my server up

@pkzscape wrote:

Hey everyone.

I have worked on my rsps server about half week. I have everything done in server and client. Portforward account done, and server has been in serverstatus. Its called Pkz-Scape. Nice shops at home and it has shops in modzone,donatorzone and staffzone. Couple nice things in zones. Example: In Modzone you can buy gilded stuff etc. It has 474 weapon stance and specs 100% working. Good donator-shop too. Forums are ready. I have pictures uploaded to imageshack so u dont need to do screenshot thing.

But here’s the problem

If someone kind guy/girl can keep it up, he will get all cash from donations and u will be co-owner :p. Will some1 help me?

PM me
